name: Garbage Gourmet
description:
The winter season is fast approaching, and the city is littered with garbage. Your goal is to grab as many garbage bags as possible, to prepare for the harsh winter ahead. But, you must be quick as you're competing against three formidable opponents - Rocky, Rocket, and Rascal. Show your waste collecting skills, and emerge as the champion with the most garbage bags!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

Esc - Options
